title: eNNiDum pOdE
sahitya:
eNNiDum pOdE inittiDum amudam ennuLLat-tirukkinradE


anupallavi

  kannalum tEnum kaniyumin pAghum enna sukhamavai idarkku nigharmO


caraNam    nAvinukkamudam shevitanukkamudam nayanattirrkkum adu nandA amudam 
pAlilum paNNilum pongiDum amudam pancamrtam magizh pazhani vAzh amudam
